item.title: New Orleans attack suspect 'hell-bent' on causing carnage, police say
item.description: The FBI says it is investigating the attack, which killed 10 and injured dozens, as an "act of terrorism".

item.title: Moldova faces energy crisis as flow of Russian gas ends
item.description: Russian gas has stopped passing through Ukraine after a five-year deal expired, leaving Moldova at risk of a crisis.

item.title: Webcam appears to show police running to New Orleans attack scene
item.description: The moment was captured on a webcam in the French Quarter of the city, moments after the attack happened.

item.title: 'The scene was just horrific' - witnesses tell of New Orleans carnage
item.description: Revellers had been celebrating the new year when a driver ploughed his pick-up truck into a large crowd.

item.title: Watch: BBC visits scene of deadly New Orleans attack
item.description: The BBC's Anna Adams had been celebrating New Year in the city, just a few hours before the attack.
